title: PM to address event marking Rs 100b housing loans by private banks today
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 24 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan is scheduled to address an event marking the approval of around Rs 100 billion loans by the private banks for house construction under Mera Pakistan Mera Ghar Scheme.
At the ceremony, the prime minister would also hand over keys to the recipients of the house construction loan.
Moreover, the event would also feature the distribution of certificates among the best-performing banks.
